and a ball struck the ground in front of them. 
"What's that that has fallen?" asked the ac- countant with a naive smile. 
"A French pancake," answered Zherk6v. 
"So that's what they hit with?" asked the ac- countant. "How awful!" 
He seemed to swell with satisfaction. He had hardly finished speaking when they again heard an unexpectedly violent whistling which sud- denly ended with a thud into something soft . . . f-f-flop! and a Cossack, riding a little to their right and behind the ac
